channel.title: Coreos on 小楼一夜听春雨
channel.description: Recent content in Coreos on 小楼一夜听春雨

item.title: Mariadb Galera Base Docker Coreos
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: MariaDB Galera cluster running on CoreOS using the official Docker images env Coreos + any public cloud (Azure, AWS, Google, etc) step 开端口: 1 2 3 4 5 6 sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-port=4567/udp; sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-port=4567/tcp; sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-port=4568/tcp; sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-port=4444/tcp; sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-port=3306/tcp; sudo firewall-cmd --reload; sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --list-port 检查mysql 是不是起
